publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1977 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Convention Rights (Compliance) (Scotland) Bill be allocated as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion on the expiry of the specified period (calculated from the time when Stage 3 begins)— Group 1 to Group 3 – no later than 50 minutes Group 4 to Group 8 – no later than 1 hour 20 minutes Group 9 to Group 15 – no later than 2 hours Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 2 hours 30 minutes Supported by: Euan Robson*
